Player History
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Chicago (A) on 6/12/1965...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Texas on 6/15/1966...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1967, hitting .333 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...

Injured on 5/29/1972 with a Strained Thigh Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drafted in 1st round, 6th overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1975...

Injured on 6/2/1976 with a Inflamed Achilles Tendon, out for one week...
